text:
Question 12) The process of urban concentration in Brazil in certain places has had moments of greater intensity and, it seems, currently undergoes a slowdown in the pace of population growth in large urban centers.
A cause for the socio -spatial process mentioned in the text is the
A) lack of raw materials.
B) degradation of the road network.
C) Increased vegetative growth.
D) centralization of political power.
E) relocation of industrial activity.
